data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In the minute 1, Free kick Leon.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Leon.
Jorge Perez awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 6, Throw-in Pumas UNAM.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Leon.
Ball safe as Pumas UNAM is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Angel Mena.
In the minute 11, Ball goes out of play for a Leon goal kick.
Angel Mena is back on the pitch.
Goal! Emanuel Gigliotti gives Leon a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 12, Fernando Navarro instrumental with a fine assist.
Goal kick for Leon at Estadio Leon.
Pumas UNAM awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 15, Angel Mena (Leon) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Joel Campbell.
Leon's Emanuel Gigliotti is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in high up the field for Leon in Leon.
In the minute 17, Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Throw-in for Leon in their own half.
Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 23, In Leon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Leon.
Throw-in Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 24, Pumas UNAM needs to be cautious. Leon have an attacking throw-in.
In Leon, Leon push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
In the minute 26, Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Can Pumas UNAM capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Leon's half?
Free kick for Leon in their own half.
In the minute 29, Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
Alan Mozo (Pumas UNAM) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in the half of Leon.
In the minute 32, Jorge Perez awards Pumas UNAM a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
Pumas UNAM's Carlos Gutierrez gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Leon. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in the half of Leon.
Throw-in for Leon in their own half.
Leon drive into the zone and Jean Meneses is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
In the minute 36, Pumas UNAM have a goal kick.
Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Leon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half?
In the minute 38, Ball safe as Pumas UNAM is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Leon in their own half.
The away team have replaced Carlos Gutierrez with Juan Iturbe. This is the first substitution made today by Andres Lillini.
In the minute 40, Pumas UNAM pushes forward through Carlos Gonzalez, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
In the minute 41, Pumas UNAM awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Leon to take a throw-in in Pumas UNAM territory.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Leon.
In the minute 43, Luis Montes of Leon smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Carlos Gonzalez (Pumas UNAM) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Leon defenders.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
In the minute 45, Jorge Perez signals a Pumas UNAM throw-in in Leon's half.
Ball goes out of play for a Leon goal kick.
At Estadio Leon the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Leon at Estadio Leon.
Jorge Perez awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick Leon.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Leon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 45, Leon attack but William Tesillo's header doesn't find the target.
Pumas UNAM have a goal kick.
The first-half is over at Estadio Leon.
Nicolas Freire for Pumas UNAM has been booked by Jorge Perez and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Leon Leon drive forward through Emanuel Gigliotti. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 48, Goal kick for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Leon.
Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in the half of Leon.
In the minute 54, Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Johan Vasquez for Pumas UNAM who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 56, Play has been interrupted briefly in Leon to check on Andres Mosquera, who is grimacing with pain.
Ball safe as Pumas UNAM is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Andres Mosquera has recovered and rejoins the match in Leon.
In the minute 59, Andres Lillini (Pumas UNAM) has taken off Johan Vasquez who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Favio Alvarez is the replacement.
Leon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 61, Andres Mosquera (Leon) has received a yellow card from Jorge Perez.
The match at Estadio Leon has been interrupted briefly for a check on Alejandro Mayorga, who is down injured.
Pumas UNAM's Favio Alvarez has been booked in Leon.
In the minute 65, Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
Alejandro Mayorga is back on his feet again.
Free kick Leon.
In the minute 67, Jorge Perez signals a Leon throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half.
Can Leon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half?
Leon drive forward but Luis Montes is judged offside.
In the minute 68, Jorge Perez awards the away team a throw-in.
Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Leon.
In the minute 70, Erik Lira is replacing Leonel Lopez for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Leon.
Throw-in for Leon at Estadio Leon.
Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 72, Jean Meneses for Leon gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Jorge Perez awards Pumas UNAM a goal kick.
Emanuel Gigliotti's header is off-target for Leon.
In the minute 72, Goal kick for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Leon.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in the half of Leon.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In the minute 75, Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Pumas UNAM to take a throw-in in Leon territory.
In the minute 76, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Joel Campbell (Leon) has received a first yellow card.
Can Pumas UNAM get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leon's half?
Marcos Ignacio Ambriz is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Leon with Yairo Moreno replacing Joel Campbell.
In the minute 80, Marcos Ignacio Ambriz (Leon) is making a third substitution, with Jose Rodriguez replacing Jean Meneses.
Throw-in Leon.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Leon.
In the minute 83, Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Leon take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Yairo Moreno.
Luis Montes with an assist there.
In the minute 85, Ball goes out of play for a Leon goal kick.
Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Leon in the half of Pumas UNAM.
Nicolas Sosa is replacing Fernando Navarro for the home team.
In the minute 87, The home team have replaced Emanuel Gigliotti with Jose Godinez. This is the fifth substitution made today by Marcos Ignacio Ambriz.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In the minute 89, Carlos Gonzalez for Pumas UNAM drives towards goal at Estadio Leon. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Jorge Perez awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Leon.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Leon.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in the half of Leon.
Corner awarded to Leon.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Jorge Perez awards Pumas UNAM a goal kick.
Leon drives forward and Nicolas Sosa gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
That's full-time at Estadio Leon. The final score is 2-0.
